继续HF2最后的故事，再度前往联合军铁塔和城市，最终逃离。黑暗环境等电梯那一段真的紧张刺激，关卡设计实在太厉害了。V社如果制作3代，肯定得达到初代和二代那么震撼，画面和世界观拓展都得是突破性的，实在太难了。要是按照那时引擎的升级版做个3出来，肯定达不到大家的要求，只能继续等了。

АХАХАХАХАХАХАХАХАХАХАХАХ Я ЧУТЬ СО СМЕХУ НЕ УМЕР АХАХАХАХАХАХАХАХАХАХА, ТЫ ТАК НЕ ШУТИ БОЛЬШЕ АХАХАХАХАХАХАХ, СЕМЬЮ ПОЗВАЛ, ВСЕ СМЕЮТСЯ, СОСЕДИ УСЛЫШАЛИ, ТОЖЕ РЖУТ, ДАЖЕ НЕСКОЛЬКО ЧЕЛОВЕК УМЕРЛО АХАХАХАХАХАХАХ, МЕНТЫ ПРИЕХАЛИ,
ПОЖАРНЫЕ, НА РАЙОНЕ КИПИШ, ВСЕ ОТ СМЕХА ПОМИРАЮТ, НА ПОХОРОНАХ ВСЕ РЖУТ, САМ ПРЕЗИДЕНТ ПРИЕХАЛ ВСЯ СТРАНА РЖЕТ АХАХАХАХАХАХАХАХАХ АХАХАХАХХАХАХАХАХА, У НАРОДА ЖИВОТЫ ЛОПАЮТСЯ ОТ СМЕХА ХАХАХАХАХАХАХАХХ, МЕРТВЫЕ ПРОСЫПАЮТСЯ И ТОЖЕ РЖУТ,
ВСЯ ЗЕМЛЯ РЖЕТ УХАХАХАХАХХАХАХАХХАХАХАХАХХАХАХААХАХАХАХАХаХАхАХАХ, ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ЕЦ, ЗАРЖАЛ ВО ВЕСЬ ГОЛОС, БАТЯ ПРИШЕЛ, ГОВОРИТ XУЛИ ТЫ РЖЁШЬ?! ПОКАЗАЛ ЕМУ, ОН ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ЕЦ ЕЩЕ ГРОМЧЕ МЕНЯ, ДАВАЙ КАТАТЬСЯ ПО ПОЛУ, ДЕД СПУСТИЛСЯ, ГОВОРИТ ЧЕ ЗА ХУЙHЯ?
ПОЧИТАЛ И ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ЕЦ ДАВАЙ РЖАТЬ ТОЖЕ,МАМА ПОЧИТАЛА, ТАК ЗАСМЕЯЛАСЬ, АЖ ДЕДОВЫМ РУЖЬЕМ В СОБАКУ НАЧАЛА СТРЕЛЯТЬ ОТ УГАРА! ПРИБЕЖАЛИ СОСЕДИ, ГОВОРЯТ ЩАС МУCОРОВ ВЫЗОВЕМ, ЧО У ВАС ТАМ ЗА РЖАКА? ПОКАЗАЛИ ИМ, ТЕ HАХУЙ АЖ С ОКОН ПОПАДАЛИ ОТ
ИСТЕРИКИ, МУCОРА ПРИЕХАЛИ, УВИДЕЛИ, Я ИМ ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ С ПОРОГА ИГРУ СУЮ, И ОНИ ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ С МАКАРОВА НАЧАЛИ ОТ РЖАКИ ♥♥♥♥♥♥РИТЬ, У ДЕДА АЖ ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ ДАВЛЕНИЕ ВСКОЧИЛО,ВРАЧИ ПРИЕХАЛИ, ПОЧИТАЛИ, ДИФЕБРЕЛЯТОРОМ ДРУГ ДРУГА EБАШИТЬ НАЧАЛИ ОТ ХОХМЫ!
Я, БЛЯTЬ, В СКАЙПE ПЕТРОСЯНУ ПОЗВОНИЛ, ТОТ УВИДЕЛ, ТАК ♥♥♥♥♥♥ УГОРАЛ, ЧТО АПЛОДИРУЯ ЛАДОНИ СЕБЕ HАХУЙ ПОЛОМАЛ! ЛOЛ, БЛЯTЬ

So My Review for Half Life 2 Episode One: 
WARNING SPOILERS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

6/10

Not Valve Quality At All In My Opinion.

PROS:
Fantastic Puzzles (Better than the first game)
Its short (I love shorter games better than long ones)
Chapter 1 and 2 Were Fantastic
Chapter 4 was okay enough

Cons:
Chapter 3 was terrible, horrible design because of flashlight usage and such. (Dark areas)
Chapter 5 was terrible, way too much repetitive tasks. Felt longer than it needed to be imo.
Screw Striders, they are terrible and the way it was used at the end was cheesy and cheap.

(SPOILERS)
Ending was one of the most satisfying I have ever felt. Although, it still wasent as good as lets say Portal 2's ending. The crash of the ship is what really threw me off with the ending.

Although, the ending got me excited to play Episode 2 and am looking forward to it.


So yeah, overall 6/10. Kind of a disappointing game in my opinion.
it's pretty fun

Esse direto é o mais fraco de todos os Half-Life's que eu já joguei não que seja um jogo ruim só achei o enredo desse mais clichê do que os outros e vale a pena menciona que ele não trouxe praticamente nada de inovação apenas o Episode Two que realmente trouxe novos inimigos e novas formas de mata-los, mas esse apenas o final que eu realmente gostei e até hoje não sei por que diabos a Alyx repete a mesma frase no final ''you did Gordon'' 2x

This is the best Half-Life 2 game out of the three. Read my reviews on the others if you'd like because I'm not going to rant here.

Short. Just the perfect length for a linear game like this. I had set my goals to get all the achievements on the first playthrough itself, which included not shooting more than a single bullet, and I was able to pull it off without using a single guide. (I was worried if that one lock [i]was[/i] indeed the correct place to shoot my single bullet though)

[spoiler]Out of the other 3 Half-Life games, the temporary ending was atleast quite satisfactory because you atleast knew what the hell was actually happening in front of your eyes.[/spoiler]

Like I said, I'm not going to rant about this, because I actually liked the game (6.9/10)

Oyun baya iyi half life 2 kadar uzun değil ama bir okadar dolu bir oyun parasına baya bir değer ztn 2 tl indirimsiz 10 tl ben baya eğlendim aslında.Güzel bir oyun herkese tavsiye ederim.İYİ OYUNLAR :)
Still Half-life but the continuation .

Fairly short game that picks up from the end of half-life 2.  You are with Alyx the entire episode and she is essential to the plot. Fortunately she cannot be killed. Even at  the easy level it can be very tough going at certain points. So save often. The use of the gravity gun is an important part of surviving. For example, if you run into antlions and their burrows you can block the burrow openings using the gravity gun to blasted cars over the openings. Works great and you can hear them underneath the cars trying to move them.

OG
GG

[h1]Resumo[/h1]
Cara, é Half-Life. Não tem muito o que falar. Nesse episódio, a presença da Alyx é muito maior e o torna bem especial, principalmente com seu final que faz o jogador querer jogar o seu próximo episódio.
[h1]Gameplay[/h1]
Praticamente igual à de Half-Life 2, clássico shooter game.
[h1]"Importância"[/h1]
Assim como todos os jogos, episódios e expansões de Half-Life, é meio óbvio que esse episódio não deve ser pulado.
[spoiler] Rise and shine, Mr Freeman. [/spoiler]

En si el juego tiene muy buena historia, te atrapa en ella mientras vas avanzando en el juego, los enemigos y las misiones que tiene son buenas, por esa razón lo recomiendo, no mas que una advertencia aunque es un buen titulo jode, caga, defeca, fastidia y chinga mucho que a cada rato te ponen un pantalla de cargando cada 5 minutos lo que hace al juego "largo", ya que eso te extiende la duración del juego mas de lo que debería, te estas mas esperando y viendo las pantallas de carga que lo que te estas jugando.
Este juego es muy bueno

Lots of fun, but more of the same, excluding the OP Zombines.

Ótima expansão. Um pouco diferente do original em alguns momentos por trazer mais ação e menos puzzles em comparação ao anterior, mesmo assim não peca em ter um ritmo frenético constantemente, as mudanças de ritmo do jogo trazem uma fluidez muito boa. Em alguns momentos achei um pouco desbalanceado e algumas sessões poderiam ter sido melhor construídas. Mas nada disso apaga o quanto é uma ótima expansão, estou ansioso para começar a jogar o Ep. 2.
